name: KUSA Aviation, LLC
about: KUSA Aviation, LLC, located at the Jack Brooks Airport in Beaumont, Texas, is a premier flight school and Fixed Base Operator (FBO). We offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, Flight Instructor, and Instrument ratings. Our training is conducted under Part 61 regulations, ensuring a thorough and personalized learning experience. In addition to flight training, KUSA Aviation provides aircraft maintenance and management services, as well as charter flights. Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors make us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. We are committed to providing high-quality aviation services and a supportive learning environment for all our students. At KUSA Aviation, we strive to help you achieve your aviation goals with professionalism and excellence.
